text:
Supplement #8, 1st quarter, 1957 offering - 2
************
Dateline Europe (57-2)
Programs nine (9) and ten (10) of this irregularly distributed series are being
sent with Issue #11. These programs are released for broadcast upon arrival.
************
Over the Back Fence (55-36) and
Drench Press Review (55-37)
Program 91 of each series (issue #12) are on timely issues. Therefore, we suggest
you audition them before broadcast. You may wish not to use them.
************
REU/dfc
3/6/57
